languages.text: Лишь внимательность Лорд-капитана и {mf|его|ее} спутников, загодя услышавших предательский треск, спасла солдат от гибели.
It is only the vigilance of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} companions, who hear the telltale crack in time, that saves the soldiers from certain death.
languages.original_text: Лишь внимательность Лорд-капитана и {mf|его|ее} спутников, загодя услышавших предательский треск, спасла солдат от гибели.

traits.locale_text: It is only the vigilance of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} companions, who hear the telltale crack in time, that saves the soldiers from certain death.
It is only the vigilance of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} companions, who hear the telltale crack in time, that saves the soldiers from certain death.
It is only the vigilance of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} companions, who hear the telltale crack in time, that saves the soldiers from certain death.
It is only the vigilance of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} companions, who hear the telltale crack in time, that saves the soldiers from certain death.

languages.text: 幸亏舰长大人与和{mf|他|她}的同伴保持警惕，及时听到了冰层开裂的声音，才让那些士兵幸免于难。
languages.original_text: It is only the vigilance of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} companions, who hear the telltale crack in time, that saves the soldiers from certain death.

traits.locale_text: 幸亏舰长大人与和{mf|他|她}的同伴保持警惕，及时听到了冰层开裂的声音，才让那些士兵幸免于难。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンとその同行者が警戒を怠らなかったお陰で、探索中に亀裂が入る音をはっきり聞き取り、兵士たちは九死に一生を得る。
languages.original_text: It is only the vigilance of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} companions, who hear the telltale crack in time, that saves the soldiers from certain death.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンとその同行者が警戒を怠らなかったお陰で、探索中に亀裂が入る音をはっきり聞き取り、兵士たちは九死に一生を得る。

languages.text: Gracias a la vigilancia {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán y sus compañeros, que oyen el crujido a tiempo, los soldados se zafan de una muerte segura.
languages.original_text: It is only the vigilance of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} companions, who hear the telltale crack in time, that saves the soldiers from certain death.

traits.locale_text: Gracias a la vigilancia {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán y sus compañeros, que oyen el crujido a tiempo, los soldados se zafan de una muerte segura.

languages.text: Heureusement, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et ses compagnons ont entendu le craquement à temps. Grâce à leur vigilance, les soldats ont pu échapper à une mort certaine.
languages.original_text: It is only the vigilance of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} companions, who hear the telltale crack in time, that saves the soldiers from certain death.

traits.locale_text: Heureusement, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et ses compagnons ont entendu le craquement à temps. Grâce à leur vigilance, les soldats ont pu échapper à une mort certaine.

languages.text: Nur die Wachsamkeit des Lord Captain und {mf|seiner|ihrer} Gefährten, die das verräterische Knacken rechtzeitig hören, bewahrt die Soldaten vor dem sicheren Tod.
languages.original_text: It is only the vigilance of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} companions, who hear the telltale crack in time, that saves the soldiers from certain death.

traits.locale_text: Nur die Wachsamkeit des Lord Captain und {mf|seiner|ihrer} Gefährten, die das verräterische Knacken rechtzeitig hören, bewahrt die Soldaten vor dem sicheren Tod.

languages.text: Yerin çatladığını zamanında duyan Lord Kaptan ve yoldaşlarının dikkati sayesinde askerler, ölümün kıyısından dönüyor.
languages.original_text: It is only the vigilance of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} companions, who hear the telltale crack in time, that saves the soldiers from certain death.

traits.locale_text: Zamandaki çatlamanın habercisini duyan Lord Kaptan ve onun yoldaşlarının dikkati sayesinde askerler ölümün kıyısından döndüler.
